description: Upload an image for livestream use case

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Permanent unique identifier is successful. Required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Unix time stamp for API validity, needs to identify your permission to call APIs. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated to indicate your different API permission. partner_key sig HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm generated string

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Indicates error type if not zero. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicates error status if not zero. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
